mapper.select: select rownum, f.* from ( select * from funding where start_date < sysdate and d_day > sysdate order by reg_date desc ) f where rownum between 1 and 6

select * from funding f
title like '%' || '${searchKeyword}' || '%'
and d_day > sysdate
and d_day < sysdate
order by reg_date desc
order by like_count desc

select * from funding F join funding_reward R on F.funding_no = R.funding_no join attachment A on f.funding_no = A.funding_no join like_record L on L.funding_no = F.funding_no where f.funding_no =#{funding_no}
